title: New England Aquarium IDs right whale found dead off Virginia
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: A 3-year-old female North Atlantic right whale, calf of whale #3293, was found dead off Virginia's Eastern Shore.
The death marks the second right whale to die in two weeks, following a male found off North Carolina entangled in gear.
The New England Aquarium's Anderson Cabot Center identified the whale; 43 confirmed deaths since 2017 impel conservation efforts.

title: Another child has died of the flu in Mass.
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Seven pediatric deaths from flu-related causes reported in Massachusetts this season, with total deaths reaching 260.
Flu activity strained Massachusetts hospitals in January, though cases are beginning to decline in February.
Public health officials urge vaccination for young children, older adults, and those with underlying conditions.

title: Mass. police department offers ‘Valentine’s Day Special’ for wanted exes
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: The Uxbridge Police Department in Massachusetts posted a humorous Valentine’s Day offer targeting individuals with outstanding warrants.
The post encouraged residents to provide information on ex-partners with warrants, offering arrests as a 'gift' option.
Similar themed initiatives were seen from police departments in New Hampshire, Ohio, Nebraska, and New York.

title: ‘We’ll see how it plays out’: Caleb Durbin, Marcelo Mayer each to practice at 2B, 3B to begin spring training
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Red Sox manager Alex Cora plans to have Caleb Durbin and Marcelo Mayer practice at both second and third base positions.
Caleb Durbin, acquired from the Brewers, and Marcelo Mayer are top candidates for the starting third base position.
Infield decision-making is a priority as Boston seeks to reduce errors, having led MLB in errors the past three seasons.

title: Report: Patriots QBs coach Ashton Grant to stay in New England, won’t take OC interviews
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Ashton Grant, Patriots QBs coach, will remain in New England and not pursue open offensive coordinator positions.
In his second year, Drake Maye achieved top league stats under Grant, despite the Super Bowl loss to the Seahawks.
Grant's coaching career included roles at Holy Cross, Cleveland Browns, before joining Patriots hired by Mike Vrabel in 2025.

title: Brighton community raises $25k for flooded barbershop
author: Annie Jonas
bullets: Brighton's Matt's Barber Shop was flooded due to a burst pipe after a tenant left heat off in freezing weather.
A customer, Dietrich Warner, started a GoFundMe for the barbershop, raising over $25,800 from the community.
A benefit show is planned for Feb. 19 at O'Brien's Pub to support the barbershop's recovery efforts.

title: 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Romantic comedy 'Eternity' featuring Elizabeth Olsen and Miles Teller is now streaming on Apple TV.
'Harold and Maude' starring Bud Cort and Ruth Gordon is available for streaming on Pluto TV.
'Love Is Blind' Season 10 is now streaming on Netflix, coinciding with Valentine's Day.

title: Court says Mass. father’s battle over LGBTQ-friendly lessons excludes books on gender stereotypes
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Federal judge rules that two storybooks on gender stereotypes are not part of a Massachusetts father's lawsuit against LGBTQ lessons.
The lawsuit filed by 'Alan L.' targets LGBTQ content; he claims it conflicts with his Christian values in Lexington schools.
Judge Saylor's ruling states Lexington schools don't need to allow opt-outs for books on gender stereotypes, not gender identity.

title: Roman Anthony set to join Team USA for World Baseball Classic if he passes physical
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Roman Anthony, 21, of the Boston Red Sox is set to join Team USA for the World Baseball Classic pending a physical.
Anthony, a last season debutant with a .292 average, replaces injured Corbin Carroll, becoming the youngest on Team USA.
Garrett Whitlock joins Anthony on Team USA; other Red Sox players will represent countries like Venezuela, Mexico, and Japan.

title: $20M penthouse at Taylor Swift’s rumored wedding venue hits market
author: Regina Cole
bullets: A $20 million penthouse at Watch Hill's Ocean House in Rhode Island is on the market.
The 4,696-square-foot penthouse features three bedrooms, four bathrooms, and luxurious amenities.
The unit includes access to Ocean House's private beach, club amenities, and spectacular ocean views.
